title: Host a Grand Opening Event
description: A developer is launching sales for a new townhome community and hosts a grand opening event for the public and brokers.

tasks.description: Plan the event, including arranging for catering, music, and a ribbon-cutting ceremony with local officials.
tasks.expected_outcome: A detailed event plan is created.

tasks.description: Promote the event through local media, online event calendars, and social media.
tasks.expected_outcome: The event is widely publicized to drive attendance.

tasks.description: During the event, have sales agents on hand to give tours of the model homes and capture leads from interested buyers.
tasks.expected_outcome: The event successfully generates a list of qualified sales leads.
